body_html:
Benoit would have a better idea of what he'd like, but it's much easier to review a change that has like, <10 files, < 200-300 LoC change at a time; that we he can review it, it will have fewer things to change, and we can make more iterative progress.

Might be worth you and Benoit talking offline to see what's going to work well!

(I'm just on sync rotation this week and trying to help move things along :)

Might be worth you and Benoit talking offline to see what's going to work well!
